snippet: Ellen Pao's lawyer says she wants to wage her sex discrimination case against the venerable Silicon Valley venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers in a "public forum" and opposes an arbitration.
abstract: Ellen Pao's lawyer says she wants to wage her sex discrimination case against the venerable Silicon Valley venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers in a "public forum" and opposes an arbitration.

headline.main: Lawyers for Discrimination Plaintiff Vow to Fight Venture Firm in 'Public Forum'
